YearPicker.name: value
YearPicker.description: Sets the selected year ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamps.

YearPicker.name: disabled
YearPicker.description: Disables all years from being selected, or given ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamps from being selected.

YearPicker.name: once
YearPicker.description: Disables toggling off of already selected years.

YearPicker.name: highlight
YearPicker.description: Highlights the given ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamps as outlined.

YearPicker.name: timestamp
YearPicker.description: Sets the ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamp of the calendar being listed.

YearPicker.name: max
YearPicker.description: Sets the maximum year timestamp ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 in the future that can be selected.

YearPicker.name: min
YearPicker.description: Sets the minimum year timestamp ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 in the past that can be selected.

YearPicker.name: sizing
YearPicker.description: Sets the size of children / spacing relative to the font size of the YearPicker.

YearPicker.name: calendar
YearPicker.description: Alters the calendar used for calculations / formatting via Temporal Calendar Codes.

YearPicker.name: locale
YearPicker.description: Alters the locale used for displaying internationalized text via RFC 5646 / BCP 47 language tags.

YearPicker.name: year
YearPicker.description: Alters how a displayed year is formatted.

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {YearPicker} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const timestamp = "2020-01-01[u-ca=gregory]";
    const value = ["2024-01-01[u-ca=gregory]"];
</script>

<YearPicker
    palette="accent"
    width="content-max"
    {timestamp}
    {value}
/>
snippets.title: YearPicker Preview

        "2025-01-01[u-ca=gregory]",
        "2023-01-01[u-ca=gregory]",
    ];
</script>

<YearPicker
    palette="accent"
    width="content-max"
    {disabled}
    {timestamp}
/>

snippets.title: YearPicker Sizing

data.render:
YearPicker

YearPicker is a Widget that displays a decade-based grid of years that a user can select from.

Imports

<script>
    import {YearPicker} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Disabled

You can disable all interactivity via the disabled property.

Disabled Years

You can disable specific years from being selected via the disabled property.

Multiple

You can allow for multiple years to be selected via the multiple property.

Once

You can disable selected years from being unselected via the once property.

Readonly

You can disable interactivity without changing the visuals via the readonly property.

Highlight

NOTE: By default, the current year is used.

You can select a specific set of years to be highlighted as outlines via the highlight property.

Maximum + Minimum

You can set maximum and minimum range of selectable years via the maximum / minimum properties.

Custom Format

You can customize how the year component of the available timestamps is displayed via the year property.

Sizing

You can alter the overall spacing / sizing look and feel via the sizing property.
